name: Oriole Ornithology
completionText: Congratulations! You completed the tutorial! You now know everything you need to know to set out on an adventure! Good luck out there!
Description: A small bird wants to help you figure things out. You haven't started this quest yet. Talk Tuto in Quepland Fields to begin.

flags.name: Get Yer Axe
flags.description: Tuto told you to visit your bank and withdraw your axe.

flags.name: Find the Bank
flags.description: Tuto told you the bank is at the top left corner of the screen.

flags.name: Click Yer Axe
flags.description: Tuto told you to click the axe in your bank.

flags.name: Chop a Tree
flags.description: Tuto told you to return to Quepland Fields and click Chop White Pine. You'll gain woodcutting experience.
